QuestData.Title: Dying Wish
QuestData.Description:
I am too far gone to rescue, but thank you for speaking with me.
Blademaster Bralok had his men starve and beat me, and he stole an heirloom that has been in my family since before we arrived on Draenor.
Should you find it, please let me see it once more so I may die in peace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Ahm's Heirloom from Blademaster Bralok.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. Now that I know it is out of the hands of the Iron Horde, I can die peacefully.
